Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: R. Perez "lado oscuro"
Reviews.Content: I travel to and from other countries, I wanted a phone that would work with other country's cellphone carriers. Calls come clear as well as text I have no complaints since I know what I purchased.Was not looking for cell I would not be mad if lost or stolen. I just put in both sim cards and had service on the phone right away, I have the option of having both sim cards work at the same time or just one depending on the country/carrier I choose to use.It has a camera radio and flashlight but I don't really care for those since I just wanted a PHONE that would take the place of two cells.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic phone and service!!!
Reviews.Author: Timothy A.
Reviews.Content: It exceeds my expectations, who ever designed this type of phone, knoew what they were doing, very easy, and fun to use, and at a super great price, what else does a person need.  A BLU cell phone will take care of it!!  Plus a very good size but not too small.  an't say enough

Reviews.Title: Out of the box good
Reviews.Author: BS Webb
Reviews.Content: This phone makes an excellent gift to a first time phone user. Plenty of accoutrement at a very reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Have been using thi phone for about 18 months
Reviews.Author: chuck Houlihan
Reviews.Content: we wanted a cheap phone to use in various countries around the world.  it came with NO instructions at all.  Had to hunt and peck on the internet to find out how to open it and install the battery and a sim card.  So a bit frustrating at first.Now we have used it on 6 different countries and it works ok.  We only use it for calling.  No texting blue tooth etc. If it gets lost or stolen no big deal.  Heck we already got our ones worth out of it.The major annoying thing is not being able to increase the volume to hear.  If we get a call on the street with traffic almost impossible to hear.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: james lovett
Reviews.Content: this works like  a charm,love the fm radio.i can enjoy music when i travel to friends and family.hope to order another one real soon.

Reviews.Title: you get what you pay for, but...
Reviews.Author: Boris
Reviews.Content: you get what you pay for, but... pretty good simple phone for the price.Sound quality - not the best, but acceptable. (I'm using with AT&T; SIMcard)Battery life - about one week, with ~1 hour of conversations.Camera - poor/pretty useless, even on the highest setup.Bluetooth - I was able to transfer files to my Android Samsung Tablet, but not able to connect it for hands-free conversation in my Honda.

Reviews.Title: The Money you pay is the quality
Reviews.Author: Srikanth
Reviews.Content: You get for what you pay. It is good and worth for the money. You will not like it if you used a smart phone.

Reviews.Title: Bluetooth would not connect
Reviews.Author: TKO "TKO"
Reviews.Content: I needed a basic phone with bluetooth.  Well, the basic phone part worked.  The bluetooth didn't.  Mainly the Toyota Prius.  It doesn't work with it.  It connects and disconnects.  Will not stay connect.  If you are buying it for Bluetooth purposes, I'd look else where.

Reviews.Title: HOW DO YOU OPEN IT . . . ??!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jacqueline Tavernier
Reviews.Content: HOW DO YOU OPEN IT????This is not yet a review, for the simple reason that I can't open it to put the battery in. I have already broken 2 nails in attempting it. Obviously I don't want to damage it in any way, especially if it should turn out that I have te return it. But,  PLEASE tell me how to open it. The tiny little booklet (needs a microscope to read it) says nothing about it.Also, if someone has a recommendation for a SIM card that works in the USA and does not expire when the phone is not used for 6 months or more, please do let me know.

Reviews.Title: very good phone
Reviews.Author: nadine walker
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my son,he's living it bought with a dought but it works pretty well..small but has its used.

ProductInfo.Name: BLU Aria T174 White Unlocked GSM Dual SIM QuadBand Bar Cell Phone
